mapper.insert: insert into t_position (positionName, positionType, remark,orderId) values (#{positionname,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{positiontype,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{remark,jdbcType=VARCHAR},#{orderId})
mapper.select: select id, positionName, positionType, remark,orderId from t_position order by orderId
select id, positionName, positionType, remark,orderId from t_position where positionName like concat(concat('%',#{keyword},'%')) order by orderId
select id, positionName, positionType, remark,orderId from t_position where positionType = #{positionType} order by orderId
